items.text: short and wide, cut to sweeper cover

items.text: comes down the ground and gets to the pitch and goes inside-out through the covers

items.text: length, tries to tuck but the ball clips the pad and runs down to fine leg

items.text: backs away and punches to sweeper cover

items.text: short, sitting up nicely on off, muscles a pull off the backfoot through deep midwicket

items.text: swing and a miss outside off

items.text: good length, angling into middle, keeps low as he stays back and gets an outside edge too third man
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, 2 runs

items.text: full outside off, slashes hard at it and gets a thick outside edge that lands short of deep backward point
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, 1 run

items.text: full, angled into middle, clipped to midwicket

Rubel Hossain to Hope, 1 run

items.preText: Ahmad: "with 94% of control percentage, having a strike rate of 42 is criminal from Samuels. Putting pressure on himself & the batsmen to come. I really want him to click, his heroics in T20 Finals can't be forgotten. All he needs is to strike freely from the word go as a senior most batsman in the team."
items.text: short of a length, punched off the backfoot to point who flings himself to his right to make a brilliant save
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Samuels, no run

items.text: arches away and pulls a short ball to deep square
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Samuels, 1 run
